Vocab Builder

A wonderful app that not only allows you to search and save words to a study deck to review later, but it also allows you to play a 'Family Fued' style game that builds your vocabulary by quizzing you on synonyms and antonyms.

Live Link

Project Overview

This app is a one stop shop to build your vocabulary. Use AI to search a word and get its various definitions. This App allows you to add your own synonyms and antonyms to a word - it allows you to save a word into a study deck which you can review later. You also can add your own words to your study deck and add your own synonyms and antonyms to that card as well.

Many apps out there will give you a definition of a word, some will allow you to save them to a study deck as well. What really sets this app apart is the emphasis on taking words you learn and moving them from your passive vocabulary - to your active vocabulary... the vocabulary you use everyday. With the gameified 'Vocab Dojo' you are tested on the synonyms and antonyms of the words in your study deck making sure you will never be left with a word on the tip of your tongue ever again.
